DOC.brief_summary: The trial aim ass value drain elective laparoscopic cholecystectomy .
DOC.detailed_description: After laparoscopic gallbladder removal patient randomize suction drain position subhepatic space sham drain subhepatic space . The primary outcome measure presence subhepatic fluid collection ultrasonographic examination first postoperative day . Secondary outcome measure postoperative abdominal shoulder tip pain , use analgesic , nausea , vomit morbidity
DOC.criteria: elective laparoscopic cholecystectomy acute cholecystitis , cholangitis , pancreatitis contraindication laparoscopic additional procedure
